description:
## Objective 
Design the  Settings Screen in mifos-mobile-cn android app.

## Steps
1. Install mifos-mobile-cn android app in your phone .
2. On selecting Navigation Drawer , you will find a field "Settings" . For now it is not clickable.
3.  **You have to design a new screen for it which is more user friendly** .
4. First create the mockups in adobe or where ever you are comfortable , discuss the design with your mentor then start working on android studio .

## Resources
Here is a sample for your help : https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35039342/48678333-d7f4a380-eba7-11e8-95ec-bb18e79b91f8.png

## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos-mobile-cn).
name: Mifos Mobile CN app: Design the "Settings" Screen .
